page.title: 11OLDACRES,BISHOP'S CLEEVE
page.content: {Oldacres}originally started the business 60 years ago.They were farmers who owned some of the land in Bishop's Cleeve. The company which W.J.Oldacre founded,now makes animal feed.They run seven mills which are spread across the country.People who live in Bishop's Cleeve can smell the feed and hear the grinders.The large mill here has six silos. It is a highly automated business run by computers. 85% of the feed is delivered in bulk and the rest is put in sacks. One room in the{Old Rectory {(now Oldacres}offices) has a picture of Slad Valley painted on its walls.The murals are in what is now the boardroom where the shareholders meet. Seven people work in the laboratories where tests are done on the feed.{Oldacres}send their experts abroad to promote their skills.
